mapper.select: SELECT a.id_waiting_reg , b.real_name , a.no_reg , b.phone_no , CONCAT(LEFT(b.idcard,2), '**************', RIGHT(b.idcard,2)) as idCard , date_format(a.gmt_reg , '%H:%i:%s') as gmt_reg, b.user_id FROM we_waiting_reg a LEFT JOIN user_info b ON a.id_user_student = b.user_id WHERE a.id_org = 1
